p: Based on the above-ground biomass, the competition response values of Mikania at 0% and 50% defoliation were less than 0, whereas those at 25%, 75% and 100% defoliation were more than 0, indicating that competition had a negative effect on the growth of Mikania at 0% and 50% defoliation but had a positive effect on the growth of Mikania at 25%, 75% and 100% defoliation. The competition response values of Mikania at different defoliation intensities were higher than those without defoliation, particularly at 75% ( Fig. 4), indicating that defoliation could alleviate the negative effect of competition on the growth of Mikania.
